casebody.data:
PHILLIPS AND JORDAN INV. CORP.
v.
GREUN MADAINN, INC. No. COA07-1105. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 15, 2008. Certification Date May 5, 2008. Appeal from Graham (06CVS26).

Cases reported without published opinion. Affirmed in part; reversed in part and remanded to the trial court for disposition in accordance with the provisions set out herein.
